Class WorkerFactory

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.k36.omo.bartom47.smartfactory.workers.WorkerFactory
public class WorkerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Represents worker factory. Singleton.

    • getFactory

      public static WorkerFactory getFactory()
      Gets the singleton instance
      Returns:
      singleton instance

    • createOfClass

      public Worker createOfClass​(java.lang.Class<? extends Worker> clazz, Assembly assembly) throws WorkerFactoryException
      Creates new worker as an instance of worker class given. This worker will be a child of assembly given.
      Parameters:
      clazz - child class of Worker
      assembly - parent assembly node for new worker
      Returns:
      new worker instance of worker class given
      Throws:
      WorkerFactoryException - when problem occurs during the process. See details of Throwable.getMessage() and Throwable.getCause() for more details.

    • addSupportedClass

      public void addSupportedClass​(java.lang.Class<? extends Worker> clazz)
      Adds class given to supported classes of the factory.
      Parameters:
      clazz - class to be recognized as supported
